had for breakfast okay sausages now
first the computer jumbles the letters
up to disguise the fact that it's an
English word at all and then it turns

then it takes each block of 64 digits
and changes them round again using a
complicated code called an algorithm and
this second set of 64 digits is now so
well disguised that only I and the

possibilities and that I'm here to tell
